title: Inviting Participation: The Public�s Role in Stress Testing�s Next Chapter
content: - 6 -     around the value and public worth of our mission. The Federal Reserve is the steward and trustee   of that mission, but the public is its owner. To serve the public, we must not just allow input, but   welcome it; not just permit debate, but foster it; not just allow participation, but treat it as   essential to our work.    Thank you.
